channel.title: Im noob =O
channel.description:
Ok.. I know this is a noob question but.. after I pasted the SCAR script into the program I pree CTRL + ALT + R ... is that correct.. cause I dont know if you have to fill out something in the script.. but it dont work right.. it just doesnt go =S
Edit: On one of the scripts im trying to use the error is Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.01\includes\SRL\SRL.Scar does not exist.
Edit : Wuts this Line 50: [Error] (52:10): Duplicate identifier 'UpChars' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.01\includes\ssi2.txt

item.title: Im noob =O
item.dc:creator: @jay24 jay24
item.description:
@jay24 wrote:

It doesnt say anything like that … but I do go to File -> Download SRL INCLUDES and SRL…thats what I did… I dont get anything like that though.

Read full topic

item.title: Im noob =O
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“jay24, post:3, topic:79851”]hmm I do have it downloaded I dont think I got ne thing like that… should I redownload? If I should could you give me link =S n where will i find it in installation?
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 09:01:25 AM[/size][hr]Ohh wait up… its in the SCar program… i click file and download the SRL and the includes… am I correct?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 09:05:45 AM[/size][hr]is it correct?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 10:19:31 AM[/size][hr]Could ne one help?
[center] Rule 5:
We don’t “bump” or double post. If you want to add something to a post, edit your existing post[/center][/quote]

4 Posts in a row, woot. You had the right to get warned.

Anyway, download the latest SCAR here. For the first time, it will ask you to download the latest SRL and the other includes. Copy and Paste the script into SCAR and then press CTRL+ALT+R (If you have set another hotkey, press that instead) or you can press the green play button. But always, you have to drag the crosshair over the window you want in order for it to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Im noob =O
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

Do you have scar verzion 3.01? Try downloading that and when you downlaod and once it’s downloaded it will say “would you liek to download the latest verzion of srl?” say yes and you wont get that failuar anymore.
Don’t forget once you downlaod scar v3.01 you must redownlaod the includes.

Read full topic
